item.title: How do i edit my shops ... i go on 2 shops.cfg then wut?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

When you Go in shops.CFG you will see

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop = 1 Varrock_General_Store 1 1 1931 5 1935 2 1735 2 1925 3 1923 2 1887 2 590 2 1755 2 2347 5 1265 5 1351 5 3140 5000 379 1000

Shop = 1 Is the Shop ID
The Name is the second thing
The 3rd Thing The ‘1’ Means the shop buys everything if its ‘2’ it only buys wht it stocks
the 3rd number is the same but for sellling.
then every number after follows this rule
the item id e.g 1931, then press tab and that is the number it stocks
to change the shop just put:

Shop = SHOPID   SHOP NAME   1    1   1931   5

REMEMBER to put a tab in between each entry… to continue adding stuff keep putting ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT (With a TAB inbetween)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit my shops ... i go on 2 shops.cfg then wut?
